title: OPEC Declines Action As World Oil Prices Hit Record Lows
teaser: OPEC oil producers met Thursday to discuss falling world oil prices â€” something big producer Saudi Arabia seeks to preserve in order to compete with U.S. oil production. But other OPEC countries want to get prices back up because their governments need the money.
